descriptor.long_desc: This classic blend of aloe vera and essential oil of sweet basil will leave you feeling healed with its warm, spicy aroma. Made using wild beeswax and pure coconut oil, this soap moisturizes, improves skin tone and balances oil production.Ingredients: coconut oil, beeswax, lye, sweet basil essential oil. Forest Post beeswax soaps are made in small batches, by women of forest communities in Karrikadav village, Kerala, India. Forest Post is a social enterprise that connects forests with people and people with fast-disappearing forests through value-added non-timber forest produce gathered, produced and packaged by forest communities. The beeswax in our soaps and balms comes from the forests of the Western Ghats and Bastar.
descriptor.name: Forest Post Aloe and Sweet Basil beeswax soap
descriptor.short_desc: Skin like butter. With Forest Post beeswax soaps. True bee magic. No sulphates, no phthalates, no parabens, no articial fragrances. No palm oil. Gentle on skin. Gentle on the planet.

descriptor.long_desc: Pick up Cedar Hemp Body Rub if fine lines and wrinkles make you nervous. TThis moisturizing rub is a hero combination of three super ingredients: hemp seed oil, castor oil and kokkum butter, made for a skin repair and moisturising regimen especialy good for extra dry skin, bordering on itchy skin. Hemp seed oil is known to improve skin elasticity and tone. Castor oil has antioxidants, which help repair damage caused by sun and pollution, over the years. Kokkum butter and beeswax help seal in skin moisture while letting the skin breathe. Beeswax is rich in vitamin A and is anti-allergenic. In a crisp, outdoorsy fragrance of cedarwood and lemon.           All Forest Post  moisturisers, body butters and body rubs are made of 100% natural ingredients and are safe for facial application.

The Forest Post Hemp and Tea Tree beard wax keeps your skin infection free, soothes and cleanses, while it lets you bring order to your beard. descriptor.long_desc: Plant-based kokkum butter, an Uttara Kannada special, joins warm, tropical notes of vanilla in this olive oil-beeswax medley called Forest Post Vanilla Kokkum Beeswax Body Butter. This moisturiser is a favourite because of its elegantly matte, non-sticky, moisturising effect. Kokkum butter is easily absorbed when massaged into the skin and is known to be superbly effective in the treatment of dry, cracked skin. Like our other key ingredient, beeswax, kokkum butter is also non-comedogenic. That is, it does not clog pores. Which makes it a preferred moisturising choice for oily skin and skin with acne. All Forest Post  moisturisers, body butters and body rubs are made of 100% natural ingredients and are safe for facial application.
descriptor.name: Forest Post Vanilla Kokkum Body Butter 30g
